turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a coffee from Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which coffee drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caffe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like Extra Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately Peets only offers small, medium and large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take the large then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any add ins?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll have sugar and that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 1854 Westwood Blvd

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, to confirm, you'd like a large Caffe Latte with 2% milk, caramel and sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has been made and will be ready for pick up soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to you via a text message. Is that everything.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thank you!

items.name: Unfortunately Peets only offers small, medium and large
